thread.title: Vietnam massacre survivors remember 'darkness and silence'

title: Vietnam massacre survivors remember 'darkness and silence'
text:
Vietnam massacre survivors remember 'darkness and silence' 4:56am EDT - 01:54 
As Vietnam marks 50 years since the My Lai massacre, survivors look back on the worst recorded U.S. war crime committed in the country. Reuters' James Pearson was there. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
